page.title: 07Holwell - Diet and Clothing
page.content:
{DIET About 30% of questionnaire returns show a good diet with enough fibre. 35% of returns show diets high in sugar and fat,low in fibre,but with plenty of variety. 30% gave no information. The small remainder shared a poorly balanced diet.
{PREFERRED CLOTHING} Two-thirds of the returns indicate a preference for clothing of natural fibres,wool,cotton or linen. Mixed fibre clothing was universally popular;the qualities of natural fibres combined with easy laundering of synthetics give a satisfactory combination. Entirely synthetic clothes were not popular.
